articleSchema.title: string - article title

articleSchema.content: string - full article content in markdown

sourceArticle.url: string - URL of the original source article
sourceArticle.title: string - title of the source article
sourceArticle.publishDate: string - ISO 8601 date when source was published
sourceArticle.summary: string - brief summary of the source article content
sourceArticle.author: string - original author or publication name
sourceArticle.relevanceScore: number - how relevant the source is to author's expertise (1-10)
sourceArticle.researchDate: string - ISO 8601 date when source was found
sourceArticle.researchQuery: string - search query used to find this source

bannerImage.description: string - image description for alt text
bannerImage.generatedAt: string - ISO 8601 date when image was generated
bannerImage.model: string - AI model used (dall-e-2, dall-e-3, mock, etc.)
bannerImage.error: string - optional error message if generation failed

articleSchema.readingTime: number - estimated reading time in minutes
articleSchema.featured: boolean - whether to feature on homepage
